front.title: NIST scientific integrity program

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This report summarizes the findings of the National Institute of Standards and Technology Scientific Integrity Program assessment of the program for the period between 1 June 2022 and 30 September 2023. It provides an assessment of the current state of the program and activities that occurred during the program period. The report includes a summary of the baseline evaluation conducted in advance of programmatic updates in 2024.

seriesInfo.name: NIST special publication; NIST special pub; NIST SP
